# Using ggplot's stat_summary

Some grouped data
```{r}
data(ToothGrowth)
ToothGrowth$dose <- factor(ToothGrowth$dose)

```

## Standard plot of means w/ error bars
## w/ stat_summary(...geom = "pointrange")

```{r}
se <- function(x){
  sd(x)/sqrt(length(x))
}
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(ToothGrowth, 
       aes(y = len, x = supp, colour = dose, group = dose)) + 
  stat_summary(fun.y = mean,
               fun.ymin = function(x) mean(x) - 1.96*se(x), 
               fun.ymax = function(x) mean(x) + 1.96*se(x), 
               geom = "pointrange") +
  stat_summary(fun.y = mean,
               geom = "line") +
  theme_bw()
```



## Plot just means
## w/ geom = "point"


```{r}
ggplot(ToothGrowth, aes(y = len, x = supp, colour = dose, group = dose)) + 
  stat_summary(fun.y = mean,
               geom = "point") +
  stat_summary(fun.y = mean,
               geom = "line")
```
